question: What the note is at the 12th fret of the 1st and 6th strings of a standard-tuned 6-string guitar?
vanilla_rag_result: The note at the 12th fret of the 1st string (high E) of a standard-tuned 6-string guitar is E, and the note at the 12th fret of the 6th string (low E) is also E. Therefore, both the 1st and 6th strings play the note E at the 12th fret.
